function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spreading of misinformation through social media","Impact":"Lack of adherence to recommended public health measures, engagement in non-recommended behaviours","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, fact-checking initiatives, and responsible social media use","Technologies":"Fact-checking algorithms, content moderation tools, and community guidelines enforcement","People":"General public","Owner":"Social media platforms, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Misinformation fueling health anxiety and impairing health-related decisions","Impact":"Increased anxiety, poor health-related decisions, inaccurate evaluation of severity of situations","Mitigation":"Promotion of accurate information, mental health support, and critical thinking education","Technologies":"Mental health apps, online educational resources, and accuracy verification tools","People":"General public, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health organizations, educational institutions"}]}
